summary: Comprehensive testing of Kashmkari Customer Support Platform completed successfully. All core features working perfectly including dashboard stats, order creation, 8-stage tracking, touchpoint system, high-priority identification, and Heritage Luxury design implementation.
passed_tests: Order creation with correct high-priority logic (<$500 = false, >$500 = true)
Reminder system API (currently 0 reminders as expected)
Dashboard loading with accurate stats (Total: 4, Pending: 4, High Priority: 3)
Order cards display with proper status badges and touchpoint indicators
Navigation between Dashboard and Create Order pages
Create Order form with all required fields and validation
Order Detail page with functional touchpoint toggles
Order progress stepper with clickable checkboxes
High priority badge display for orders >$500
Form validation preventing invalid email and empty submissions
Order card click navigation to detail pages
Real-time updates between frontend and backend
Heritage Luxury theme with Deep Wine, Gold, Ivory colors
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (10/10 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI components and integrations working)
